content: In this debate on illegal immigration - why we are debating is beyond me, because criminals are criminals - we Americans keep getting called lazy and unwilling to work manual-labor jobs. I believe there are millions of Americans who would strongly protest that. Among them are the approximately 130,000 Americans currently in Iraq and Afghanistan, trudging the terrain in full-body armor and combat loads, and at least triple number that who have pulled tours. Body armor alone is 50 pounds, 120 rounds of ammo is about 20 pounds, an M-16 is 7 pounds, and MRE and other gear adds up to 15 to 25 more pounds. Now go about for a day or more with all that. Oh, and let's not forget, people are trying to kill you the entire time. How many Mexican or Central or South American military personnel are in these areas? ZERO. Mexicans are so willing to do the jobs that no one else "wants" to do? Well, there is genocide in Darfur that no one in the world wants to dirty their hands with. Is Mexico sending peacekeepers? NOPE. Somalia is still a hell hole, Mexico, ya'll wanna head over there and help out? I've been to Korea. I didn't see any Mexican troops over there helping guard the DMZ. Maybe Vietnam could have been different if 12 million illegals had helped out instead of only thinking of themselves. It would be a great help if Mexico and all points south would help in the War on Terror. World War II should have been called "World War II Minus Mexico." The only thing the Mexicans did was not take Hitler up on the plan to invade the United States. Later, South America helped out by taking in all the Nazis on the run. Good work there, guys. So, I guess the people south of us are really brave, marching in our streets, demanding rights and amnesty, but they sure are cowards when it comes to making any changes in their own corrupt countries or helping out in the world stage of events. Is it any wonder the chihuahua is the preferred dog? All bark and no bite. Are any countries in this hemisphere besides Canada doing anything to help out the rest of the world? Is there a single thing coming from down south that we actually need? Several countries to our immediate south are going down the gutter. Is anyone down there doing anything to fix it? Heck no. They are bailing out like rats, and at the same time re-creating the same failed environments here. America has been so helpful in bailing out these corrupt governments for so long, they now expect it - just as our welfare people do here. They don't want to earn it, but have the mentality that we "owe" it to them. America is nothing more than a welfare state to the world now. These other countries are all grown up; it's time to let them fail or succeed without us. Let's fix ourselves, starting with voting out all these rich boy glad-handers and getting some people who can actually solve a problem or two. Ask anyone in Polk County, Florida who's lost his job in construction to corrupt contractors who want to cut costs by using illegal workers, if we need illegals. If there were no illegals, people could make a decent wage. My stepfather was a block mason making $24 an hour in the 80’s and 90s. Now, no one gets more than $10, yet the cost of living has tripled. These American workers have been robbed of a higher standard of living by the greedy back-room dealings of the rich and getting richer. Only the wealthy are using the illegals as nannies and house help, so of course they will be against deportation. God forbid they spend time with their own kids, or maybe do their own laundry. Any fool who says we need illegals needs to take a look outside their bubble, because we don't. To say we need them is the same as saying we need sweatshops and forced prostitution. Do we really need indentured servants? Is that what the liberals are saying? Are they saying we need not worry about ghettos in our towns? Well, as long as they are not in their towns, right? Some cities are passing resolutions to be safe havens for illegals. I cannot wait for the floods of people to hit them up. Don't tell me Americans are lazy. It looks to me like we are doing the jobs that no other country in the world wants to do. We send our money to save people, we send food, and most of all we send our children to defend and protect the same people who would gladly stab us in the back. We put up with being called racists while saving Muslims in Croatia from genocide and helping out the very illegals who plan to take parts of our nation. We are called warmongers for keeping the battles away from the American streets where the people who hate us live. We Americans protect a land that has not seen war on its own soil in more than 100 years. What other nation can say that? Lazy? Well, I'll take lazy over a coward any day.

content: this topic is nothing less than the ignorant raving of an uneducated poster World war two , mexico helped out immensely. they provided oil for the allies, they provided food, and manpower. i am sure when you ask the family of Macario Garcia what he did, you'll hear "nothing" mexico had a small army at the time and was just recovering from a 17 year revolution. no help in our war agaimst terrorism? are you kidding? who do youi think provides trhe oil that our war vehicles run on? who do you think provides the food our troops eat? you are so convinced that latin America is doing nothing, will you please stop speaking out the lap of ignorance and RESEARCH you r argument before posting? Mexico has supported our policy in the middle east. in their war agaimkst the narcos, mexico is in fact blocking attacks to America. maybe if america kept our noses OUT OF OTHER PEOPLE'S business, we'd be in less trouble why should ANYONE back our campaighns to "help" people? we only help those who we want to.. what did we do in RWANDA? in Liberia? in Zimbabwe? Laos? Thailand? Nigeria? where were we when chile was killing off dissidents? when Argentina was arresting and torturing dissidents? when mexico was gassing their rebels? where were we when haiti was killing off dissidents? nowhere... there was nothing there of interest to us.. no business no mines no diplomatic ties.... and now you demand that they commit troops to a cause that does no one any good short of making a few business men rich? "cowards" you call them? i call them brave standing up to the most powerful nation on earth. This message has been edited. Last edited by: Elesso, Thu 19 March 2009 03:12 PM

content: Oh the tears coming from my eyes. The pain I feel now about Mexico. Oh how I hate them. BS. You think they are a bunch of cowards and won't fight? Ask Davie Crocket about that. America for its size and population is the most corrupt nation on this planet and that my friend is a fact. We did such a fine job in Somalia and in Dufur that it is a leading tourist destination now. NOT. Wake up from your dream world buddy. America is turning into a bunch of free loaders, cowards, and scammers. Don't believe me then check your email everyday or your mail box. Our justice system is a joke and has been for some time. I know dozens of people that will not get off their butts and work for $9 or $10 bucks an hour. Every watch the news post Katrina? Remember all the Blacks who were crying about having no money, no water, no job and yet they were put up in Hilton and Hampton Inns for months and months without ever going to the unemployment office. When those 18 Rangers were killed in Somalia did Willie boy call up one or two AC-130's gun ships and have them fire up that town? NO. He pulled us out within 9 days. Heck if I was El Presidente of Mexico I wouldn't want my troops over there to begin with. Maybe we should just let some of these rouge countries live the way they want to. Sooner or later they will wind up killing themselves anyway. Just look at all the Muslims of the world for a good example. NO, I don't bad mouth any countries anymore. I sure don't want them to follow our lead. But hey I love America. I love Fox news and I voted for Sarah Palin.

content: Matter of fact, two more dead Americans today at the hands of an illegal. Two people that would still be alive and breathing, living their lives and doing whatever it was they were. But, thanks to the failed Government we have, and the bleeding hearts that say, "awww, they just want a better life,". Two more AMERICANS DIED TODAY. Are there anymore questions about my motivations and intent? Who here did not take The OATH? If ya forgot it, look it up and re-read it. I don't care whatever else is spinning in your brain....TWO MORE AMERICANS DEAD AT THE HANDS OF ILLEGALS. Is it clear enough yet? From todays Breitbart dot com writer Jim Salter "But some in this Mississippi River community of 17,000 best known as Mark Twain's hometown aren't just outraged by the violence. They also question why Cazares was in Hannibal at all. Cazares admitted after his arrest that he is an illegal immigrant from Mexico. The 32-year-old had several run-ins with law enforcement before the homicides, but officials had never questioned his legal status. Now he is charged with two counts of second-degree murder and armed criminal action in the Feb. 28 deaths of his ex-girlfriend, 27-year-old Amanda Thomas, and 25-year-old Carl Patrick Epley. " This message has been edited. Last edited by: OldArmyLove, Fri 20 March 2009 05:11 PM

They also question why Cazares was in Hannibal at all. Cazares admitted after his arrest that he is an illegal immigrant from Mexico. The 32-year-old had several run-ins with law enforcement before the homicides, but officials had never questioned his legal status. Now he is charged with two counts of second-degree murder and armed criminal action in the Feb. 28 deaths of his ex-girlfriend, 27-year-old Amanda Thomas, and 25-year-old Carl Patrick Epley. " This message has been edited. Last edited by: OldArmyLove, Fri 20 March 2009 05:11 PM

title: Just here to do the jobs Americans won't?

content: In this debate on illegal immigration - why we are debating is beyond me, because criminals are criminals - we Americans keep getting called lazy and unwilling to work manual-labor jobs. I believe there are millions of Americans who would strongly protest that. Among them are the approximately 130,000 Americans currently in Iraq and Afghanistan, trudging the terrain in full-body armor and combat loads, and at least triple number that who have pulled tours. Body armor alone is 50 pounds, 120 rounds of ammo is about 20 pounds, an M-16 is 7 pounds, and MRE and other gear adds up to 15 to 25 more pounds. Now go about for a day or more with all that. Oh, and let's not forget, people are trying to kill you the entire time. How many Mexican or Central or South American military personnel are in these areas? ZERO. Mexicans are so willing to do the jobs that no one else "wants" to do? Well, there is genocide in Darfur that no one in the world wants to dirty their hands with. Is Mexico sending peacekeepers? NOPE. Somalia is still a hell hole, Mexico, ya'll wanna head over there and help out? I've been to Korea. I didn't see any Mexican troops over there helping guard the DMZ. Maybe Vietnam could have been different if 12 million illegals had helped out instead of only thinking of themselves. It would be a great help if Mexico and all points south would help in the War on Terror. World War II should have been called "World War II Minus Mexico." The only thing the Mexicans did was not take Hitler up on the plan to invade the United States. Later, South America helped out by taking in all the Nazis on the run. Good work there, guys. So, I guess the people south of us are really brave, marching in our streets, demanding rights and amnesty, but they sure are cowards when it comes to making any changes in their own corrupt countries or helping out in the world stage of events. Is it any wonder the chihuahua is the preferred dog? All bark and no bite. Are any countries in this hemisphere besides Canada doing anything to help out the rest of the world? Is there a single thing coming from down south that we actually need? Several countries to our immediate south are going down the gutter. Is anyone down there doing anything to fix it? Heck no. They are bailing out like rats, and at the same time re-creating the same failed environments here. America has been so helpful in bailing out these corrupt governments for so long, they now expect it - just as our welfare people do here. They don't want to earn it, but have the mentality that we "owe" it to them. America is nothing more than a welfare state to the world now. These other countries are all grown up; it's time to let them fail or succeed without us. Let's fix ourselves, starting with voting out all these rich boy glad-handers and getting some people who can actually solve a problem or two. Ask anyone in Polk County, Florida who's lost his job in construction to corrupt contractors who want to cut costs by using illegal workers, if we need illegals. If there were no illegals, people could make a decent wage. My stepfather was a block mason making $24 an hour in the 80’s and 90s. Now, no one gets more than $10, yet the cost of living has tripled. These American workers have been robbed of a higher standard of living by the greedy back-room dealings of the rich and getting richer. Only the wealthy are using the illegals as nannies and house help, so of course they will be against deportation. God forbid they spend time with their own kids, or maybe do their own laundry. Any fool who says we need illegals needs to take a look outside their bubble, because we don't. To say we need them is the same as saying we need sweatshops and forced prostitution. Do we really need indentured servants? Is that what the liberals are saying? Are they saying we need not worry about ghettos in our towns? Well, as long as they are not in their towns, right? Some cities are passing resolutions to be safe havens for illegals. I cannot wait for the floods of people to hit them up. Don't tell me Americans are lazy. It looks to me like we are doing the jobs that no other country in the world wants to do. We send our money to save people, we send food, and most of all we send our children to defend and protect the same people who would gladly stab us in the back. We put up with being called racists while saving Muslims in Croatia from genocide and helping out the very illegals who plan to take parts of our nation. We are called warmongers for keeping the battles away from the American streets where the people who hate us live. We Americans protect a land that has not seen war on its own soil in more than 100 years. What other nation can say that? Lazy? Well, I'll take lazy over a coward any day.

content: this topic is nothing less than the ignorant raving of an uneducated poster World war two , mexico helped out immensely. they provided oil for the allies, they provided food, and manpower. i am sure when you ask the family of Macario Garcia what he did, you'll hear "nothing" mexico had a small army at the time and was just recovering from a 17 year revolution. no help in our war agaimst terrorism? are you kidding? who do youi think provides trhe oil that our war vehicles run on? who do you think provides the food our troops eat? you are so convinced that latin America is doing nothing, will you please stop speaking out the lap of ignorance and RESEARCH you r argument before posting? Mexico has supported our policy in the middle east. in their war agaimkst the narcos, mexico is in fact blocking attacks to America. maybe if america kept our noses OUT OF OTHER PEOPLE'S business, we'd be in less trouble why should ANYONE back our campaighns to "help" people? we only help those who we want to.. what did we do in RWANDA? in Liberia? in Zimbabwe? Laos? Thailand? Nigeria? where were we when chile was killing off dissidents? when Argentina was arresting and torturing dissidents? when mexico was gassing their rebels? where were we when haiti was killing off dissidents? nowhere... there was nothing there of interest to us.. no business no mines no diplomatic ties.... and now you demand that they commit troops to a cause that does no one any good short of making a few business men rich? "cowards" you call them? i call them brave standing up to the most powerful nation on earth. This message has been edited. Last edited by: Elesso, Thu 19 March 2009 03:12 PM

content: Oh the tears coming from my eyes. The pain I feel now about Mexico. Oh how I hate them. BS. You think they are a bunch of cowards and won't fight? Ask Davie Crocket about that. America for its size and population is the most corrupt nation on this planet and that my friend is a fact. We did such a fine job in Somalia and in Dufur that it is a leading tourist destination now. NOT. Wake up from your dream world buddy. America is turning into a bunch of free loaders, cowards, and scammers. Don't believe me then check your email everyday or your mail box. Our justice system is a joke and has been for some time. I know dozens of people that will not get off their butts and work for $9 or $10 bucks an hour. Every watch the news post Katrina? Remember all the Blacks who were crying about having no money, no water, no job and yet they were put up in Hilton and Hampton Inns for months and months without ever going to the unemployment office. When those 18 Rangers were killed in Somalia did Willie boy call up one or two AC-130's gun ships and have them fire up that town? NO. He pulled us out within 9 days. Heck if I was El Presidente of Mexico I wouldn't want my troops over there to begin with. Maybe we should just let some of these rouge countries live the way they want to. Sooner or later they will wind up killing themselves anyway. Just look at all the Muslims of the world for a good example. NO, I don't bad mouth any countries anymore. I sure don't want them to follow our lead. But hey I love America. I love Fox news and I voted for Sarah Palin.

quote: Originally posted by Vanir97: quote: Originally posted by Elesso: this topic is nothing less than the ignorant raving of an uneducated poster World war two , mexico helped out immensely. they provided oil for the allies, they provided food, and manpower. i am sure when you ask the family of Macario Garcia what he did, you'll hear "nothing" mexico had a small army at the time and was just recovering from a 17 year revolution. no help in our war agaimst terrorism? are you kidding? who do youi think provides trhe oil that our war vehicles run on? who do you think provides the food our troops eat? you are so convinced that latin America is doing nothing, will you please stop speaking out the lap of ignorance and RESEARCH you r argument before posting? Mexico has supported our policy in the middle east. in their war agaimkst the narcos, mexico is in fact blocking attacks to America. maybe if america kept our noses OUT OF OTHER PEOPLE'S business, we'd be in less trouble why should ANYONE back our campaighns to "help" people? we only help those who we want to.. what did we do in RWANDA? in Liberia? in Zimbabwe? Laos? Thailand? Nigeria? where were we when chile was killing off dissidents? when Argentina was arresting and torturing dissidents? when mexico was gassing their rebels? where were we when haiti was killing off dissidents? nowhere... there was nothing there of interest to us.. no business no mines no diplomatic ties.... and now you demand that they commit troops to a cause that does no one any good short of making a few business men rich? "cowards" you call them? i call them brave standing up to the most powerful nation on earth. The people of Mexico need to stand up and replace the government and start down a new path. Number one priority should be to recall all twelve million aliens from the USA. Be careful with your views Elesso you might be among the twelve million sent to Mexico.

content: Matter of fact, two more dead Americans today at the hands of an illegal. Two people that would still be alive and breathing, living their lives and doing whatever it was they were. But, thanks to the failed Government we have, and the bleeding hearts that say, "awww, they just want a better life,". Two more AMERICANS DIED TODAY. Are there anymore questions about my motivations and intent? Who here did not take The OATH? If ya forgot it, look it up and re-read it. I don't care whatever else is spinning in your brain....TWO MORE AMERICANS DEAD AT THE HANDS OF ILLEGALS. Is it clear enough yet? From todays Breitbart dot com writer Jim Salter "But some in this Mississippi River community of 17,000 best known as Mark Twain's hometown aren't just outraged by the violence. They also question why Cazares was in Hannibal at all. Cazares admitted after his arrest that he is an illegal immigrant from Mexico. The 32-year-old had several run-ins with law enforcement before the homicides, but officials had never questioned his legal status. Now he is charged with two counts of second-degree murder and armed criminal action in the Feb. 28 deaths of his ex-girlfriend, 27-year-old Amanda Thomas, and 25-year-old Carl Patrick Epley. " This message has been edited. Last edited by: OldArmyLove, Fri 20 March 2009 05:11 PM
